Dance of Dragons deals 4 damage divided as you choose among up to two targets. The first time one or more permanents dealt damage this way die this turn, draw a card.
Showcase {5}{U}{R} [i](Then if you cast this for its showcase cost, create a 1/1 red Bard creature token that can’t block and exile this. When that token attacks, you may cast a free copy of this.)[/i]
